marklogic.body: brian.... amzn isn't incredibly profitable. 96 billion market cap EPS $1.37 P/E ~ 150. A single ebook might have a decent gross margin, but the aggregate is reflected in the numbers above. AMZN is a sinkhole compared to Apple. selling zillions of kindle fires isn't going to improve their profit picture. they can't include all the bells and whistles that apple does on an IPad because a retina display, a 5 MP camera, GPS, etc. etc. are irrelevant to book reading. apple has the sweet Spot; amzn has dreams.
